title: Family Resources Survey for financial year 2017 to 2018 - Carer
description: Results from the Family Resources Survey for financial year 2017 to 2018, providing information on income and circumstances of UK households. Includes a table of Carer information.
notes: This ETL covers the Carer dataset there is a seperate ETL for Disability an XLS and ODS document for each dataset available on the landing page.  This report also links into another ETL which has been created under affordable housing
There are 2 Age dimensions as listed above.
